headline: Why Investors Should Consider Nucor (NUE) for Materials Dividends Exposure
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is included among the 13 Best Materials Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) ranks among the top steel producers in North America. A key advantage of the company is its use of electric arc mini-mills, which are more adaptable than traditional blast furnaces used for making primary steel. This […]
